title: Football Matches 2024/2025
subtitle: 1,941 matches across 6 top competitions with FT/HT/ET/Penalties and derived features.
description: A tidy football dataset (single CSV) covering the 2024/2025 season across 6 top competitions. Includes detailed scores, dates, venues, referees, and derived fields such as goal difference, total goals, outcomes, and points. Perfect for sports analytics, machine learning, and dashboards.
